data.title: Pirelli Motorcycle: technology and innovation for motorcyclists
data.meta_description: Check out Pirelli Motorcyle: tradition, technology and innovation for motorcyclists
data.text:
Road tyres

For the most discerning motorcyclists, the Pirelli catalogue offers road motorcycle tyres that ensure excellent performance and maximum safety on the road, from mountain passes to the urban environment.

DISCOVER ROAD TYRES

Adventure tyres

Excellent ride comfort, maximum safety and Pirelli catalogue. These products are designed for motorcyclists who love trips away with friends and adventure excursions.

DISCOVER ADVENTURE TYRES

Off road tyres

The wide range of off-road motorcycle tyres in the Pirelli catalogue includes products offering top performance on any soft, medium or hard terrain, even in the harshest riding conditions.

DISCOVER OFF ROAD TYRES

Racing tyres

The Pirelli brand has always been respected globally for its sporting DNA. The racing motorcycle tyres in the catalogue ensure high performance in all kinds of competitions, both on the track and off-road.

DISCOVER RACING TYRES
